SPIR.AT.long_name: The House of Agriculture Spiroy S.A.
SPIR.AT.summary: The House of Agriculture Spiroy S.A. researches, produces, processes, and markets vegetable propagating materials. The company provides cotton, corn, alfalfa, cucumber, endive, watermelon, pumpkin, cauliflower, onion, cabbage, lettuce, eggplant, and broccoli seeds. It offers its products in Greece, Albania, Macedonia, Bulgaria, Romania, Spain, Africa, Turkey, the Middle East, Ukraine, Russia, Kazakhstan, and Moldova. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
